text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the HP OMEN 15-dc1030nr 15.6" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 in the HP OMEN 15-dc1030nr 15.6" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
